title: When I see that Riven's win rate has been dropping.
body:
http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/2820/496/original.jpg?w=320&h
This is seriously the best splash art I have seen in ages.

Edit: Here's an image made by Unicky
http://i.imgur.com/NErW2Gx.jpg
Edit 2: Fixed to make it bigger.

replies.body: This is literally the first splash art to portray the champ surprised

This is literally the first splash art to make me laugh my ass off and really wanting this to be a thing.

Caskbreaker is love
Caskbreaker is life
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fa.disquscdn.com%2Fuploads%2Fmediaembed%2Fimages%2F2820%2F496%2Foriginal.jpg%3Fw%3D320%26h&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425
I hope that gets added to the stickers :p
If we meme it enough it'll probably will.

I don't think Riven was really indirectly nerfed in this patch, as it is that people keep playing the High Crit champions and using Warlord's Bloodlust with it's massive Sustain. I'm looking at you assholes in specific {{champion:23}}  {{champion:157}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:11}}

Everyone happy now, jeez
Warlord's Bloodlust no longer heals off minions.
Does it proc off something like say {{item:3087}}
Only if it hits a champion.
It's a direct critical strike, so no. It's only when on-hit effects are applied and the damage crits when you get the heal. Auto attacks and things like Yasuo's Q.

Just a question...

WHO THE HELL BUILDS CRIT ON AATROX?!?
People use to ask that when I would build IE on Riven, little did they know the true power of er burst with that and Ghostblade when it would crit.
It adds a bit of flavor to the usual face-keyboard style of playing Riven.
However unlike most Assassin's IE is virtually useless on Riven unless she's really fed or the game is super late.
It all depends how many autos she crits on when doing her combo :P
I mean personally Id rather go with that Undying Mastery MUCH more Aatrox favorable imo
That's debatable, since Aatrox would generally want to invest more points in ferocity. But I run it on Shen and might try it on Aatrox sometime.

I mean i have a page that would fit most bruisers that is 12-0-18 and instead of abilities doing more dmg just switch it to attack speed. The new mastery pages dont provide as many free stats as the previous ones more of tweaks to playstyle. Since Aatrox is a sustain dmg dealer healing 3% max HP every 4 seconds is great imo.  The only onein Ferocity i could even see Aatrox taking is Fervor of battle but he can get more than enough dmg from items and his kit giving him extra sustain is great considering how squishy most Aatrox are

Only thing I've ever built crit on Aatrox is PD
Used to be for attack speed and movement, now it's for the passive. And IMO Fervor of battle works way better on him

It really does. His style of harass is to farm, build up stacks, then jump on your opponent for a free W damage proc. That nets you a nice 10 stack fervor bonus, that scales both with your auto and W damage, and it's overall just great.
hey new meta i guess XD
Also I think with Mundo coming back into meta she's having more sad days

I never had to many problems with Mundo.

{{summoner:14}}

Neither did the scum of the Earth.

{{champion:114}}
Same here. Even when he does not die, we can force a retreat and get the priority targets. Just build well or smart instead of just getting crit XD. But ppl never learn do they =. (

Nah, Riven does well against Mundo - or rather used to before preseason changes. Riven generally outdamages Mundo early easily, is able to shield his Q and even deny him minions (just E b4 the cannon) and should be able to snowball against him.
Mundo also has to ult extremely early so that Riven is able to bait his ult - because if he doesn't Riven just bursts him down (don't forget that Mundo ult costs a lot of HP at the beginning!). 

However, Riven currently sucks hard seeing how she isn't able to deal with ADC's atm. Everyone who has to get close to ADC's without being tanky is bad (exceptions: Yasuo/Tryn + some who don't suck that badly). The item path got more expensive for her but she can't use the stats she gets additionally that well - masteries also suck for her in comparison to the old ones. Thus Riven can't properly snowball and stop Mundo from ignoring her. Ugh.
How is Aatrox buffed? What does he care for crits? He has no crit synergy in his build and now he even lost his Zephyr...

He has alot of synergy with crit

He has one of the coolest crit animations ever
Nobody builds Crit on Aatrox.....

**When she got dat booty:**

http://i.imgur.com/kMlJUSF.jpg?1
riot can we have this as a sticker?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Thats the face i made trying to read what the image said.

 Its a tad small lol
Shhhhhhhh it's fixed now. No one will ever know shhhhhhhh.

Caskbreaker certainly is...

http://static.tumblr.com/ab9b2b06f9c56811940ec35475bca78a/whnwjik/1rOmj5ql5/tumblr_static___sticker_375x360.png

I do understand that you dislike playing against Riven, but please consider the following: Riven has many loyal players who love to play her. She probably has the biggest fanbase of all champions - who all love playing her. Us Riven players don't play her because we are Satan (well, I also like playing Teemo, so I am probably an exception) or want to win (if I want to tryhard in Ranked I don't play Riven. She is too hard and not rewarding enough - my op.gg is proof of that).
We like playing this champion and her general character.
So do laugh and make jokes about us, we understand it and can deal with it. But always be aware that even Riven mains have a heart. Thanks.

> [{quoted}](name=singurytas,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ytGhvQw6,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-11-20T14:06:47.542+0000)
>
>  even Riven mains have a heart. 

I don't believe you

Don't worry buddy I play Champs that are designed to piss off others and make people regret playing with me.

Teemo, Urgot, Garen, Yasuo, Zed, Blitzcrank, and Singed and I am starting to mess around with Riven but I find her very frustrating to play against as it makes lane boring as hell about the fact that I have to hug tower to prevent her from letting her snowball and starving her for a good 20 minutes before someone exciting happens. It also doesn't help how much mobility and reliable defense she has with her shield.

I know you guy have hearts and such and you main champs that piss off others (Look at me i main Yas) but I'm just surprised about the win rate dropping and I saw Caskbreaker Gragas splash art and I couldn't help but combine the two together.

So don't worry it is all fun and games here.
As I said, it's alright to make fun of her and such, but please always keep in mind that Riven players actually may be nice people. Some people tend to forget about that.
{{champion:79}} "I CAN SEE EVERYTHING"
"I CAN SEE CLEARLY NOW THE BOOZE IS GONE"

I memeified that for you, my friend. With the meme generator

http://imgur.com/NErW2Gx

(edit I wasn't exactly sure which site to use so I uploaded it on imgur let me know if you want me to take it down)
Nice job man! I'm a take that and give you credit for it.
You embedded the preview miniature instead of the real image. 2smol
More like the face when I see that AP Yi is back.
Tbh it looks like hes just remembering what he did when he was drunk the night before
i never really thought she was that strong in the first place lol

it should be continued like this:
 "... but people still spamming her in every single game"
Makes me want to add, "When ADCs see Rengar gets a damage buff in ult" xD
Disable Yasuo plz.
Praise The Sun... too bad its gragas, i suck so much with him
I hope I'm not the only one who thought that was Braum.
